QuestData.Title: Outpost Over Yonder...
QuestData.Description: I see that you haven't visited my brothers at the Explorers' League Outpost south of here. Why don't you do Donny a favor and deliver this message to Stanwad. He'll be interested to hear about the activities of the iron dwarves up here.$B$BLike I said, mount up and start heading south. You'll see the outpost right before you get to Baelgun's.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Donny's Letter to Stanwad at the Explorers' League Outpost.
QuestData.RewardText: Yea, this isn't anything we don't already know. At least Donny's still alive.
